info.title: Crosswork Data Gateway Management Custom Software APIs
info.description: APIs to support Cisco Crosswork Data Gateway Management's custom software functionality.

post.description: The custom software file's fileType can be DEVICE_PACKAGE or MIB_PACKAGE. The collectorType can be CLI or SNMP.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: For the SNMP DEVICE_PACKAGE fileType, the fileName must be an XDE PAL/XDE device package archive with the .xar extension. For example: custom_show_cdp.xar. For the MIB_PACKAGE fileType, the fileName must be custom-mib-packages.tar.xz. For CLI DEVICE_PACKAGE fileType, file name must be  custom-cli-device-packages.tar.xz.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The DEVICE_PACKAGE fileType applies to an SNMP or CLI collectorType. The MIB_PACKAGE fileType applies to the SNMP collectorType only.

parameters.name: collectorType
parameters.description: The collectorType can be SNMP or CLI.

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: A text string describing the custom software package.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The content of the uploaded file.

200.description: OK. The request was successful. The result is contained in the response body.

400.description: Bad Request. The request is malformed in some way and the server cannot process it.

put.description: Helps in updating the custom-mib-packages.tar.xz MIB package. Update is supported for custom-mib-packages.tar.xz only.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: For the MIB_PACKAGE fileType only, the filename must be custom-mib-packages.tar.xz.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The fileType must be MIB_PACKAGE only. Update is supported for custom-mib-packages.tar.xz only.

parameters.name: collectorType
parameters.description: The collectorType must be SNMP. This is the only collector type supported for the PUT operation.

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: A text string describing the custom software package.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The content of the uploaded file.

200.description: OK. The request was successful. The result is contained in the response body.

400.description: Bad Request. The request is malformed in some way and the server cannot process it.

delete.description: Deletes one or more custom software packages.
delete.summary: Deletes one or more custom software packages.

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Info that identifies the custom software package files that need to be deleted.

200.description: OK. The request was successful. The result is contained in the response body. For example: The custom files specified were deleted.

400.description: Bad request - validation errors. Note that deletion stops immediately when a specified file is not found.

post.description: Displays all the uploaded custom software files based on a specified range.
post.summary: Displays all the uploaded custom software files based on a specified range.

200.description: OK. The request was successful. The result is contained in the response body.

post.description: Downloads the custom MIB packages file 'custom-mib-packages.tar.xz' to the local host.

200.description: OK. The request was successful. The result is contained in the response body.

404.description: Not Found. The client made a request for a resource that does not exist.

startRow.description: Specify the starting row of the custom software files list.

endRow.description: Specify the end row of the custom software files list.
